title: Jobs职业插件指令可使用但击杀怪物不加经验.
author: Makrs
txt_content:
如题.
今晚一晚上被这个问题折磨得头疼,各种看配置,转编码,加权限,比如猎人这个职业,配置设定是杀怪可以获得职业经验提升等级,但我选了猎人职业后
去杀怪,就是TM死活不给老子加职业经验,气的我那头是一个两个大.
并且在载入服务器配置的时候会出现这个报错:
16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Brewer has an invalid Brew type property: RABBIT_FOOT!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Hunter has an invalid Kill type property: SHULKER!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Hunter has an invalid Kill type property: GUARDIAN!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Hunter has an invalid Kill type property: RABBIT!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Farmer has an invalid Breed type property: Rabbit!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Farmer has an invalid Break type property: BEETROOT_BLOCK-3!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Farmer has an invalid Break type property: CHORUS_FLOWER!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Farmer has an invalid Break type property: CHORUS_PLANT!16.11 21:49:22 [服务器] 警告 Job Miner has an invalid Break type property: PRISMARINE!

replies.txt_content: 服务端版本1.7.10.服务端核心MCPC+.
